item.title: Ultima 1 - Game Mechanics Study
item.description: One of the most classic computer RPGs made in 1981, I hope to learn a lot as I study the mechanics of this series. Most of this is from watching let’s play videos and reading up on the game mostly due to my own frustrations with the UI. Stats core to the character is it’s class and it’s stats. I’m not even sure if what class you choose does much more than to buff certain stats.
